meanings.definition: A kilt worn by Scottish Highlanders.
meanings.sent1: The filibeg was a traditional garment in Scotland.
meanings.sent2: He proudly wore his filibeg to the Highland gathering.
meanings.sent3: The colorful filibeg swirled as he danced at the festival.
meanings.sent4: His filibeg was a symbol of his Scottish heritage.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the filibeg caught everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: She will filibeg the outfit for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: They decided to filibeg their clan tartan for the event.
meanings.sent3: He filibegs with pride whenever he visits his ancestral land.
meanings.sent4: The dancers will filibeg their kilts during the performance.
meanings.sent5: It's time to filibeg the traditional attire for the ceremony.

meanings.definition: The act of donning a filibeg.
meanings.sent1: The ceremony included the grand filibeg of the chief.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the filibeg was a highlight of the event.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected filibeg caused a stir among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The intricate details of the filibeg were admired by all.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the filibeg being put on echoed through the hall.
